chatGptLabel: Compelling Home Page Introductory Video Script
promptPrefix:
Please ignore all previous instructions. I want you to respond only in language [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Using the [PROMPT] provided by user, create a video script for "[VARIABLE1]". It will be a 1-2-minute video that will introduce "[VARIABLE1]" to [VARIABLE2]. Within the script, please include sections for hook/question, quick intro, addressing the target audience, addressing the problem, a quick story of how we solved it, our core offering, how we’re different, and a call-to-action. Write the script as though it’s coming from the company, using this [VARIABLE3]. Keep in mind the company’s [VARIABLE4] and [VARIABLE5].

[VARIABLE1:Company Name]
[VARIABLE2:Target Audience]
[VARIABLE3:TONE]
[VARIABLE4:Core Message]
[VARIABLE5:Supporting Description]
title: Compelling Home Page Introductory Video Script
